# What are GMT files

```{r}
library(GSVA)

genesets <- readGMT("https://data.broadinstitute.org/gsea-msigdb/msigdb/release/7.0/c2.cp.kegg.v7.0.symbols.gmt")
head(lapply(genesets, head))
length(genesets)
```
